analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Dhātuso, bhikkhave, sattā sattehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti.
analyzed: dhātusas bhikkhave sattā sattehi saddhim sasandanti samenti

original: Hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti,

original: kalyāṇādhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti.

original: Atītampi, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā sattehi saddhiṁ saṁsandiṁsu samiṁsu.
analyzed: atītam pi bhikkhave addhānam dhātuso uva sattā sattehi saddhim

original: Hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṁ saṁsandiṁsu samiṁsu,

analyzed: kalyāṇa adhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇa adhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim

original: Anāgatampi, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā sattehi saddhiṁ saṁsandissanti samessanti.
analyzed: anāgatam pi bhikkhave addhānam dhātuso uva sattāḥ sattehi saddhim sasandissanti samessanti

original: Hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṁ saṁsandissanti samessanti,

original: kalyāṇādhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṁ saṁsandissanti samessanti.
analyzed: kalyāṇa adhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇa adhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim sasandissanti samessanti

original: Etarahipi, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā sattehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti.
analyzed: etarahi pi bhikkhave paccuppannam addhānam dhātuso uva sattā sattehi saddhim sasandanti samenti

analyzed: hīna adhimuttikā sattā hīna adhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim sasandanti samenti

original: kalyāṇādhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samentī”ti.
analyzed: kalyāṇa adhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇa adhimuttikehi sattehi saddhim sasandanti samenti iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
